channel.title: Amnesia718 ☼ 24-7 ☼ Updated Daily ☼ Custom Features ☼ VPS Hosted
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Pd66muS.png[/img] We stand for quality, we have and always will. We are a 24-7 VPS Hosted community. We try to minimize the downtime and create a lag free environment. With all skills fully working and a completely re-designed combat system which is one of the most accurate out there to this day, we are happy to say that our players love Amnesia718. With the daily compliments we get ingame and on the forums, and with the suggestions posted, we keep Amnesia718 growing and holding daily updates. Amnesia runs a 718 server, with a 742 cache which maximizes your gameplay, and giving even better quality.
Homepage: [url=http://amnesia718.com]http://amnesia718.com[/url] Forums: [url=http://amnesia718.com/forums/index.php]http://amnesia718.com/forums/index.php[/url] Download: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/y205zkgvz5uqdet/AmnesiaV3.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/y205zkgvz5uqdet/AmnesiaV3.jar[/url]
[size=18pt][b]We guarentee you will:[/b][/size] -Enjoy our new combat system to the max. A Completely re-designed combat system that is one of the most accurate of all private servers. -Find yourself within an active PKing community. -Find yourself being able to level all skills. Every skill is fully working (Wilderness Agility as well for example). -Have an awesome time within our active community and staff.
[size=18pt][b]Server features[/b][/size] We would like to globally name a few of our many attractions, if we were to name them all, the list would be too long! In short: -Worldwide skilling (And a member skill island) -Active Pking all around the server -Plenty of bosses in wilderness and non wilderness -Castle Wars -Double Xp weekends -::botanybay that actually works! -::train area for beginner training -Fight pits for fun dueling -Safe Pk (dieing and you wont lose anything!) -Fully working customs -Blink -Yk'Lagor the Thunderous -Vorago (Fully Working!) -Offhand Drygores and mainhand -Gaming to the max

item.title: Amnesia718 ☼ 24-7 ☼ Updated Daily ☼ Custom Features ☼ VPS Hosted
item.dc:creator: @heller1122 heller1122
item.description:
@heller1122 wrote:

[center]

We stand for quality, we have and always will. We are a 24-7 VPS Hosted community. We try to minimize the downtime and create a lag free environment. With all skills fully working and a completely re-designed combat system which is one of the most accurate out there to this day, we are happy to say that our players love Amnesia718. With the daily compliments we get ingame and on the forums, and with the suggestions posted, we keep Amnesia718 growing and holding daily updates. Amnesia runs a 718 server, with a 742 cache which maximizes your gameplay, and giving even better quality.

Homepage: http://amnesia718.com
Forums: http://amnesia718.com/forums/index.php
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/y205zkgvz5uqdet/AmnesiaV3.jar

[size=18pt]We guarentee you will:[/size]
-Enjoy our new combat system to the max. A Completely re-designed combat system that is one of the most accurate of all private servers.
-Find yourself within an active PKing community.
-Find yourself being able to level all skills. Every skill is fully working (Wilderness Agility as well for example).
-Have an awesome time within our active community and staff.

[size=18pt]Server features[/size]
We would like to globally name a few of our many attractions, if we were to name them all, the list would be too long! In short:
-Worldwide skilling (And a member skill island)
-Active Pking all around the server
-Plenty of bosses in wilderness and non wilderness
-Castle Wars
-Double Xp weekends
-::botanybay that actually works!
-::train area for beginner training
-Fight pits for fun dueling
-Safe Pk (dieing and you wont lose anything!)
-Fully working customs
-Blink
-Yk’Lagor the Thunderous
-Vorago (Fully Working!)
-Offhand Drygores and mainhand
-Gaming to the max
